ADD_LIBRARY (FACESDK_LIBRARY SHARED IMPORTED GLOBAL)
FIND_LIBRARY (FACESDK_FOUNDLIB libfsdk.dylib libfsdk.so PATHS ${FACESDK_ROOT} PATH_SUFFIXES lib/osx_x86_64 bin/linux_x86_64)

SET_TARGET_PROPERTIES (FACESDK_LIBRARY PROPERTIES IMPORTED_LOCATION ${FACESDK_FOUNDLIB} INTERFACE_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES ${FACESDK_ROOT}/include/C)

#INSTALL (TARGETS ${FACESDK_LIBRARY} EXPORT ${EXPORT_TARGET_NAME})
#FIND_LIBRARY (FACESDK_LIBRARY NAMES fsdk HINTS ${FACESDK_ROOT}/bin NO_SYSTEM_ENVIRONMENT_PATH NO_DEFAULT_PATH)
#FIND_PATH (FACESDK_INCLUDE_DIR LuxandFaceSDK.h HINTS ${FACESDK_ROOT}/include/C NO_SYSTEM_ENVIRONMENT_PATH NO_DEFAULT_PATH)
